translations: n.[劳经] 永续年金；终身年金

sentences.sentence: The only difference between the two perpetuities is that the first one also provides a cash flow in each of the years 1 t.
sentences.translation: 这两者之间的唯一区别是前者也提供了一个从1年到t年每一年的现金流。

sentences.sentence: There have also been one hundred-year bonds and there have also been perpetuities that--in the UK, for example, the British Consoles--have no expiration date and they have infinite maturity.
sentences.translation: 也有长达百年的债券，甚至有永久债券--比如在英国，不列颠控股，没有过期时间，永不到期。
